descriptionHtml:
I was frustrated because I couldn't have Avulstein as a follower so I made a simple male follower clone nitially for personal use. Made some tweaks and decided to share. 

[b]Race: [/b]Nord
[b]Where to find him: [/b]The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
[b]Marriable:[/b] Yes.
[b]Combat Style:[/b] Melee and ranged attacks (if you give him a bow).
[b]Level: [/b]10-80

[b]Default gear:[/b]
-Iron Battleaxe
-Leather Armor
-Leather Bracers
-Leather Boots

[b]Skills:[/b]
-Two-Handed
-Light Armor
-Block
-Archery
-One-Handed

[b]Perks:[/b]
-Agile Defender
-Juggernaut
-Light Foot
-Barbarian
-Overdraw
-Devastating Blow

The hair is a standalone version of the amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/683]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies. Everthing else in his appearance is vanilla, so it will be affected by mods that changes the default skin, beard, brows and scars textures and male body type.

[b]To make Bjorn look like in the screenshots:[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82948]Vitruvia[/url] by mandragorasprouts

[b]Mods used in the screenshots:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65991/?]Barbarian Steel Armor[/url] by steelfeathers
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57467]DCR - Blade Set Reloaded [/url]by Angilla
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81151]Manticore Gear[/url] by jrc0011
author: brunoarchie
